text: Amori Kini vahe'ma Jodani timofo zage fre kazigama nemanimo'zane, Kenani Kini vahe'ma Meditereniani hagerimofo ankenaregama nemanimo'za, Ra Anumzamo'ma Jodani tima eri hagegema hige'za Israeli vahe'mo'zama Jodani tima takama he'naza kema nentahi'zageno, hanave'zamia omanege'za koro hu'za ha'ma hanaza zamagesa osu'naze.
